Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Level Description: Advanced (complete and accurate representation of all elements)
CAN: Draw a detailed string telephone setup, clearly depicting two students using the device to communicate.
Accurately show the string or wire connecting the two devices, ensuring the connection is clear and correctly positioned.
Illustrate how sound travels through the string from one student to the other, possibly using arrows or annotations to show the direction of sound travel.
Demonstrate how the device functions over a distance, effectively highlighting communication between the two points with correctly spaced figures and extended string.
Identify and label all materials used in the design of the string telephone, such as cups or cans and the string, ensuring each component is correctly labeled.
CANNOT: Might miss labeling one minor component or feature inconsistently (e.g., forgetting to label the material of the cups in one instance).
Could include minor inaccuracies in the depiction of sound travel (e.g., inconsistent use of arrows to indicate sound direction, although the concept is generally understood).
